experiment_name: Library design and screening protocol for artificial metalloenzymes based on the biotin-streptavidin technology
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:Room Temperature;    reaction_ph:6;    reaction_other_conditions:5 mM 1,1-Azobis(N,N-dimethylformamide) (diamide), 48 hours, 100 µM Sav free biotin sites (FBS), catalysis performed with CFE or cell lysates;    reaction_substrate_concentration:10 mM
